out_file.description: Main Flask application file handling todo tasks with priority tagging. Includes routes for displaying tasks, adding new tasks with priority selection (high, medium, low), and deleting tasks by index.

HTML template for the todo app interface. Displays tasks with their priority levels highlighted in different colored backgrounds, and includes forms for adding new tasks with priority selection and deleting existing tasks.

CSS stylesheet defining the layout and visual styles for the todo app. Includes specific background colors for high, medium, and low priority tasks to display them distinctly, while maintaining the original overall style and layout.
List of Python dependencies required to run the application, including the Flask framework.
JSON file describing the project structure and file details, updated to correctly list all files with accurate paths and descriptions after adding priority tagging functionality.
